TopicTitle: How do I make space black?

Articles.Content: Simple question, the stock skybox is ugly and blurry with lower graphics settings. How do I make it realistically pitch black?

5 hours ago, sslaptnhablhat said:

Simple question, the stock skybox is ugly and blurry with lower graphics settings. How do I make it realistically pitch black?

its an old thread but you may find the answer to your question. hope it helps
Thanks... now I have the Rolling stones stuck in my head....

But realistically the night sky isn't pitch black.  It's full of stars and galaxies. I know at some point in the past alternative sky boxes were available for KSP.  I don't know if they still are but a Google search should provide an answer to that question.

There are a couple of good dark skyboxes out there with high-res stars and other details. I also recommend planetshine as it reduces the general ambient light level in shadow (to absolutely 0if you adjust the slider).
